Articles.Content:
Was wondering if we had a mode that allows the player to operate multiple ships at once. I have seen a few vids that I am sure the creator is somehow operating and maintaining more than once "active" ship at a time. Sorry if this has been discussed a bunch, the search option turns up either 500 pages of useless info, or none at all. For instance, how are you suppose to use a mod like Laz's SpaceX, with returning main stages that require active operating as well as maintain the Main ships accent? 

Thx to you if you answer my question

Dren

Check out [Burn Together](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75170) for piloting several ships at once

[FMRS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80292) for SpaceX-style recovery (or just [Stage Recovery](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86677))
Some YouTubers also use kOS to let other vessels do something.
